meta.title: Wilson School District, Berks County PA

meta.name: description
meta.content: Wilson School District in West Lawn, Berks County, PA, serves over 5,900 students and 550 faculty members. Students attend one of five elementary schools, one of two middle schools, and Wilson High School.
Wilson School District, Berks County PA

Wilson School District in West Lawn, Berks County, PA, serves over 5,900 students and 550 faculty members. Students attend one of five elementary schools, one of two middle schools, and Wilson High School.

div.h1:
Hi There!
It looks like you're using an older browser which may not provide the best experience for our website.

a.span: Per the Direction of Governor Wolf, the Wilson School District will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 academic year:
Berkshire Heights Early Learning Center and the Wilson Before and After School Child Care will also be closed

div.p: Located at 2601 Grandview Boulevard in West Lawn, Wilson School District serves over 5900 students and 550 faculty members. Our teachers, staff, and principals, look forward to creating an environment where our students are empowered to create their own future!

article.class: post-241 page type-page status-publish has-post-thumbnail entry
post-6762 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-announcements wsd-format-entry wsd-format-post entry

h3.a: Board Meeting for Monday, April 20 is cancelled

div.p: Please be aware that the Wilson School Board Meeting for Monday, April 20 has been cancelled. The next Board Meeting will be held on Monday, Read More…

article.class: post-6757 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-announcements wsd-format-entry wsd-format-post entry

div.p: Thank you to our nursing team for creating a weekly newsletter for our families during this school closure. You can access each week’s edition here.

article.class: post-6753 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-announcements wsd-format-entry wsd-format-post entry

h3.a: Governor Wolf Announces Schools Closed for Remainder of 2019-2020 School Year

div.p: Governor Wolf announced on Thursday, April 9 that all Pennsylvania schools will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Our students will Read More…

article.class: post-6746 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-announcements wsd-format-entry wsd-format-post entry

div.p: The Wilson School District recently release a comprehensive Q&A related to the current school closure due to the COVID-19. To review the Q&A, please click Read More…

article.class: post-6737 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-announcements wsd-format-entry wsd-format-post entry

div.p: As we move into our online learning environment, we shared, with our families, these helpful guidelines.

article.class: post-6733 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-announcements wsd-format-entry wsd-format-post entry

h3.a: Grading Information As a Result of School Closure

div.p: One of the questions that we have received is regarding how grading will handled during this school closure. HIGH SCHOOL Grading Information: 3rd Marking Period Read More…

article.class: post-6719 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-announcements wsd-format-entry wsd-format-post entry

h3.a: April 6, 2020 Virtual School Board Meeting Attendance Information

div.p: The April 6, 2020 meeting of the Wilson School District Board of Directors will held online. To attend the meeting, click here Board Meeting Zoom Read More…

article.class: post-6716 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-announcements wsd-format-entry wsd-format-post entry

div.p: On behalf of the Wilson School Board and our entire staff, we want you to know how much we appreciate your support during this unprecedented Read More…

article.class: post-6710 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-announcements wsd-format-entry wsd-format-post entry

h3.a: All Pennsylvania Schools Closed Until Further Notice

div.p: On Monday, March 30, Governor Wolf announced that all Pennsylvania schools will be closed until further notice to keep people safe. This means that the Read More…

article.class: post-6703 post type-post status-publish format-standard category-announcements wsd-format-entry wsd-format-post entry

h3.a: How to Get Your Student’s Username and Password

div.p: Looking for your student’s username and password? Check out this helpful video and step-by-step instructions. https://www.wevideo.com/view/1616876575 STEPS: Go to Wilson SD website Choose Skyward Student Read More…

div.p: Anna Ackley, Teacher of the Visually Impaired, was able to get her three braille students connected via Zoom to do a group braille lesson! They played "Going on a Picnic" and her three braille students took turns coming up with words and brailling them together! #WilsonSD

div.p: ⁦@wilsonfh2020⁩ Virtual Team Hangout with Wilson FIeld Hockey 2020! Can’t wait for the fall!! Love these girls!! #focusonwhatwecancontrol #WilsonEmpowered #WilsonSd

div.p: Lesson this week included @kodable Beach Clean Up to celebrate Earth Day 🌎 Students then shared how they can help keep oceans clean using @Flipgrid 🗣 #FlipgridFever #ShilohHills #WilsonSD #WilsonEmpowered

This week Wilson Southern Student Council teamed up with Mama's Pizza to deliver 60 pizzas to Penn State Health St. Joe's and 60 pizzas to the Reading Hospital front line heroes. Thanks to Mama's for the match and to these students who continue to serve their community! #WilsonSD
